thread.title: Modern, clean and comfortable hotel w/small rooms
thread.title_full: Modern, clean and comfortable hotel w/small rooms - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER 61 Paris Nation Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: nycjuicebox
title: Modern, clean and comfortable hotel w/small rooms
text: The hotel is fab - very modern, clean and comfortable. We slept really well in our room, however it's worth noting that the rooms are quite compact! The showers were brilliant and there is lots to choose from for breakfast.
